storyInfo: Shu's consciousness regathered in the 'Feranmut's Heart', and stabilizes the rampaging energy core. The crisis is over, and the people witness a magnificent sunset, while the mastermind Ji seems to be scheming something else behind the curtain.

attributes.content: There's too many... we can't handle them all...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: We might not even manage to save the nearby fields.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The situation is dire, we should prioritize saving the people...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Am I imagining things...? They don't seem as fearsome as before...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: What's that sound?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: This plate is separating from the core city...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: As I thought... the vitality of these monsters is bound to Dahuang's energy core. So once we break that connection, they'll grow weaker.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hold on! Has everyone managed to evacuate here?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We notified the entire city, but is everyone here?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Everyone from Residential Sections 1 to 4 is here.
attributes.name: Lead Farmer A

attributes.content: Sections 9 through 12, all present!
attributes.name: Lead Farmer B

attributes.content: Everyone from 6 to 8 is here, but we haven't heard back from the group dispatched to Section 5.
attributes.name: Lead Farmer C

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: They were on their way from the city center when they encountered a patch of farmland under attack. Things were going badly, and that's when we lost contact.
attributes.name: Lead Farmer C

attributes.content: The energy core has broken down, and our communications systems went with it...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I'll go look for them!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Wait!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You're always chide me for acting tough, but now you're dashing ahead of us? We don't even know how many monsters are swarming the place, and you plan on charging forward alone?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: That's my experimental plot, I know it better than anyone else!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The residents there usually help me with the farmwork. I even lied to them, saying my research was going well lately...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: It's fine if you want to go, just take me along. I run fast too. I can help.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You're not from here. You've got nothing to do with the people here, and you're even a year younger than I am—
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: '...He Sheng was promoted to an Intermediate Nongye Tianshi in the year 1101 at the age of seventeen.'
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: When I was looking through the intel on Dahuang, I checked the Tianshi Bureaus' roster, and found you're a year younger than me.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: So no need to act tough at such a critical juncture, boy.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Shao lai zhe tao, do you normally speak like this back home?!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I NEVER speak like this, xin qiu!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Enough talk, let's go already!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Was the legend a lie?
The blurry rice paddies stretch to the horizon. This is a patch of living, fertile land.
The wind plays ever so, the wave of rice as song.
A nascent consciousness is born here, and a voice speaks to her.
You're back.
attributes.name: Chaotic Consciousness

attributes.content: You seem exhausted. Are you alright?
attributes.name: Chaotic Consciousness

attributes.content: So... you're already awake.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Where am I? Have I always been here?
attributes.name: Chaotic Consciousness

attributes.content: Why do I... have memories from long ago?
attributes.name: Chaotic Consciousness

attributes.content: I saw so much...
attributes.name: Chaotic Consciousness

attributes.content: War, death, plague, famine...
The disaster from above the roof washes over the land, leaving only devastation behind, followed by endless war and upheaval.
Civilizations perish, life fills with dread.
Why am I trapped in here?
Just who am I?
I feel so... frightened.
attributes.name: Chaotic Consciousness

attributes.content: The outside... is frightening.
attributes.name: Chaotic Consciousness

attributes.content: Pain.
attributes.name: Chaotic Consciousness

attributes.content: I can hear the cries of many.
attributes.name: Chaotic Consciousness

attributes.content: How can I put a stop to all this suffering?
I remember now, someone gave me a name...
Sui.
I am you.
attributes.name: Sinister Voice

attributes.content: The weeds overgrow, drowning the entire land.
The longest dark of night condenses into this single moment.
No, you're just a shadow... my shadow.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: But it isn't your suffering, it belongs to the people living on this land.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: No—
attributes.name: Sinister Voice

attributes.content: You fear because you haven't really lived yet, you don't know how this great land truly is.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: This world isn't frightening at all.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: But you've never seen crops being harvested, or people cheerfully laughing.
You've never seen countless creatures vying to survive, enduring hardship, and continuing to thrive.
You should take a closer look, if you get the chance.
I am no longer an arrogant and lonesome Feranmut, nor am I a soul adrift all on my own.
I have lived a real life here, together with the infinite variety life on this continent.
A drop of dew drips down, injecting life that spans across time into the land.
Sleep.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.text: Twilight red sets on the stalks,
these earthly strivings kissed by dew,
millennia reap me now a single tender shoot.

attributes.content: Over here! Help!
attributes.name: Panicked Farmer

attributes.content: AHHHH! Stay away!
attributes.name: Panicked Farmer

attributes.content: ...Wha!
attributes.name: Panicked Farmer

attributes.content: (Hiss)
attributes.name: Strange Fabric

attributes.content: Are... Are we saved?
attributes.name: Trembling Farmer

attributes.content: Uncle Wang! Why are you still here? Are you alright?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Xiaohe! I knew you'd come back!
attributes.name: Trembling Farmer

attributes.content: Jian gui le, these beasts just appeared out of nowhere and started chewing up all the crops here. .
attributes.name: Trembling Farmer

attributes.content: But don't worry! We protected the plot well, and didn't let a single beast pass us—
attributes.name: Trembling Farmer

attributes.content: Uncle Wang!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: It's alright... he's only fainted from shock.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The whole field is sinking inch by inch, and huge fissures can be seen across the fields in the distance.
The communication equipment's not working at all. The Tumu Tianshis don't know there's still people here, and they've already begun disconnecting the plate.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Let's hurry and move before it's too late!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: What a deep ravine...
attributes.name: Frightened Farmer

attributes.content: Have we been... left behind?
attributes.name: Frightened Farmer

attributes.content: ...Pardon me!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The young Candleholder carries the farmer on his own, and leaps into the air, crossing the gap in just a few steps.
You... you're amazing!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Zuo Le goes back and forth between the two separated plates, transporting one-by-one those left behind to safety on the other side.
But the space between the plates continues to expand at a speed visible to the naked eye, and his steps gradually grow heavier.
Until the last trip, when a gust of wind blows him back up as he almost loses his footing.
Careful now...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Many thanks...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Everyone's safe now, so hold onto me and I'll bring you over too!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: (Hiss)
attributes.name: Eerie Fabric

attributes.content: There's more of them?!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Don't get distracted...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: You're using your Arts too much.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: No need to worry about me... the students of the Tianshi Bureaus aren't as weak as you think.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The duo work together to repel a few monsters, but as they dispatch the beasts the vertical disparity of both plates escalates before their eyes.
The distance of about fifteen meters seems a unsurmountable chasm to the two.
Damn it!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Are we... stuck here...?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: This plate is about to fall, so we'd best prepare for impact... Find somewhere with soft soil to hide it, and we might...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I never noticed till now that Dahuang's plates were built so high...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Zuo Le... How many people did we save?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Don't worry, I did a headcount earlier and everyone who was here has already made it over.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Cheer up, we just have to find a way to make it back alive, and this rescue mission will be a complete success.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The legends always say as long as everyone stands together, we'll make it through any crisis, no matter how dire it gets...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Everyone's been taking care of me all these years... I've never managed to pay them back, but today...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: He Sheng struggles to finish his words, and Zuo Le realizes a bright red stain is seeping through from the other's white shirt.
You're hurt?! When did you—I'll stop the bleeding!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Zuo Le, let me give you something.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Right now?!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: This is my Tianshi apparatus with important data inside. You have to keep it safe, no matter what happens.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Alright... I'll take it.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: He Sheng ties an Originium device tightly onto Zuo Le's hand. He hits the switch, and the little thing rapidly unfolds into a kite.
What are you doing?!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I was hard on you before, but I've realized... you have a good heart.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: So I can't, leave you here...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The youth exerts the last vestiges of his strength, and a gust of wind rises. Zuo Le flies into the air carried by the kite before he can even react.
The plate below shrinks bit by bit, along with He Sheng's silhouette. But Zuo Le can make out the shapes of a few remaining monsters on the field rushing towards the shrinking figure.
(Menacing howl)
attributes.name: Eerie Fabric

attributes.content: I don't know where you came from...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: But I'm not scared...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Oink—?
attributes.name: Passing Stockbeast

attributes.content: You awake? Hey, wake up!
Wei, you hear that?
Seems like he's still breathing. Make way.
Mianmian?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: (Concerned nudging)
attributes.name: Docile Stockbeast

attributes.content: Stop... licking me... I don't have any treats on me...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: He Sheng opens his eyes to find himself lying in a field, surrounded by a plethora of worried faces.
He seems to have returned to a day he does not remember, the first day he came to this land.
Is... everyone alright?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Everyone was about to look for you when Mianmian suddenly showed up with you in tow.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But, why did you—
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: ...Thank you for saving me.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The monsters... did we beat them?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The dark clouds scatter, the bloody afterglow fades. Another sunset sprinkles a golden twilight all over the fields.
Is... is it over?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: It's over...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We won, right?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: What Shennong did then, we've managed it too...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Indeed...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Someone's managed to get the energy core under control, we did it...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Looking back at it all, isn't this the birth of a new legend?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Now that things have died down, we should head back...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Wait! If my eyes don't deceive me...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: That's... Plate A-5... the Wanqing experimental plot!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: In an overgrown field nearby stands a single rice stalk.
Zuo Le! Help me out!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Why do you want to go back? It's still dangerous!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It worked! We did it!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Wanqing, the Ten Thousand Qing of Fertile Fields... all's not lost! There's still hope for us!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The youth happily carries the rice plant, with a slight lunacy to his laughter.
What exactly...?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You'll probably just say 'You wouldn't understand, even if I told you.', right...?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'll just take you at your word...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: For these creatures to grow, they must endure a calamity. Those that survive will break out of their cocoons; those that do not will have their lives quietly snuffed out in the darkness.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: No living being can escape the cycle of destruction and rebirth.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: What exactly is he planning...?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The Feranmut's Heart...?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We meet again.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Your presence here must mean you've figured out my plans, Lord Zuo?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: What are you doing?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Weaving, as you can see.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Weaving what?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Something for sale once it's completed, of course.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: For sale to whom?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It's standard practice to keep customer information confidential.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: What's that... on the cloth?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Scenes from across the country... or perhaps to phrase it in your words, the 'splendor' of Yan?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: I spent many years traveling across Yan, visiting every city, and Dahuang is my final stop. Only today do I consider this bolt of cloth complete.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: One should use dyes of an appropriate quality for a design this beautiful. Is there any material better than Yan's splendor to dye this weave? My Hundred Scenic Portraits of Great Yan?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Countless bolts of silk and satin seem to descend from the heavens, every bolt a city, a piece of history, a facet of worldly plight.
The nation's splendor? No... It should be the hearts of the people.
Just look at how brilliant the brocade is. All the colors of their souls I've seen.
How could I dislike this mortal realm?
